::Zardus/DeathStorm/DevilDuer::

Zardus' boulder explodes, sending his flying into a tree, and most further 
shots miss him. He struggles to his feet, takes out his launcher and fires at 
the foilage that Shuko and co. ran off into. His eyes widen as he sees a 
charge land near him.

He rolls away from it, but the thing explodes, sending a tree chunk flying in 
his direction. The tree trunk hits his leg, nearly disabling it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm flies into the battle, firing shots off at Unitron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer grunts as farther shots hit him, an explosion from a charge sending 
him flying through a boulder. He barely manages to sit up, firing a few 
horribly aimed shots at the retreating preds.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot screams as his pelvic area is mutilated by further attacks. He 
falls to the ground, trying to aim his gun at his attacker as he fires.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike dodges but yells as Anubis' claws slash through his right optic 
and through half of his face. He fires some more shots at the predacon from 
point-blank range.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Deep inside the alliance base, the power supply shuts down to minimum energy 
usage, due to shield overloading. Outside, the shield flickers and 
dissapears, but the autoguns keep firing.
